definition: to turn away, i.e. (morally) be refractory
kjvTranslation: [idiom] away, backsliding, rebellious, revolter(-ing), slide back, stubborn, withdrew.

translations.id: untuk berpaling, yaitu (secara moral) menjadi tidak tahan api
translations.ja: そっぽを向く、つまり（道徳的に）難色を示す
